trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around September 6th 2009
Summary: Very bright orange light, non-blinking. NOT a shooting star!
divs: Sighting DetailsA very bright orange star, much larger than any craft in the sky traveling due north high above Highway 377 (Denton Highway) Stopped abruptly, then simply vanished. Odd because it was a sustained bright orange light, with the absence of telltale blinking airplane lights. It stopped mid-sky and vanished. No slow dimming, just completely gone, as it the light was extinguished. There were no clouds in the sky to obscure the object. The obect arced, stopped then vanished. I watched it for about 3 minutes, it had no sound.
